page.title: 11Fashion in Durris
page.content: A lot of the North Eastern people are not really fashionable but some are.People up here dress for the weather,for the country,or just for comfort.About 90% of the people in our block dress in plain clothes and 10% fashionably.The plain clothes are a dull colour.It doesn't make any difference to your clothes if you have money or not.Most of the children dress in fashion more than the adults.The children's fashion is trousers with elastic in the bottom,baggy clothes and jeans.Adult fashion is jump suits and floral prints.Fashion clothes come from big stores in Aberdeen.Many people in Durris are farmers so they wear stuff that they can move about in and work in.Most people have their hair combed straight down.Others have curly hair. Short hair is in fashion now.
